summary: When Dr. Savaard's experiment in cryonics is interrupted by the short-sighted authorities, his volunteer dies, and he is condemned to death. He vows vengeance if he can survive his own hanging.
cast: Boris Karloff|Lorna Gray|Robert Wilcox|Roger Pryor|Don Beddoe|Ann Doran|Joe De Stefani|Charles Trowbridge|Byron Foulger|Dick Curtis|James Craig|John Tyrrell|George Anderson|Sam Ash|Stanley Blystone|Harlan Briggs|Stanley Brown|Flo Campbell|John Dilson|Carl Faulkner|Chuck Hamilton|Frank Jaquet|Kenner G. Kemp|William Lally|Perc Launders|Larry Lund|Ian Maclaren|Charles McAvoy|Charles Miller|Bert Moorhouse|Franklin Parker|Tom Quinn|Bob Reeves|Walter Sande|Robert Sterling|Edward Thomas|Cyril Thornton
keywords: psychotronic film|monster movie|murder house|trapped in a house|death row
title: La horca fatal
